name: Caramel the Cat
description:
Play as Caramel the Cat! Your owner is away and you are free to destro-- I mean, play!

[ARROW KEYS] to move
[SPACEBAR] to attack
[ESC] to pause

Destroy all falling items
Avoid getting hit or you'll lose a life

Good luck!

__Made for Ludum Dare #33 game jam!__
Art : Chikoness @ Charlene A.
Programming : @oneseedfruit & Chikoness @ Charlene A.

MADE in UNITY

FIXES :

25/8/2015
- Detected a cheat code, fixed it
- Point system won't reset after game over, fixed it
